explanation: [0-0] In a dimly lit mine, two characters stand on platforms at the same height. The character on the left wears a purple shirt and yellow pants, while the one on the right wears a black and white checkered shirt. Both hold diamond pickaxes, their gazes fixed ahead. Beneath them shimmers golden lava.
[0-2] Then, both characters dig downwards. After a short while, the character on the right digs sideways. At this moment, both turn to face each other.
[0-2] Then, both characters dig downwards. After a short while, the character on the right digs sideways. At this moment, both turn to face each other.
[2-7] Subsequently, they switch positions, and the character in the purple shirt and yellow pants continues digging downwards, falling into the lava. The character in the checkered shirt looks down.
